events.name: Recycling of lithium-ion batteries (LIBs)
events.wd_description: The recycling of lithium-ion batteries involves multiple routes, primarily focusing on pyrometallurgical and hydrometallurgical processes. The paper emphasizes the hydrometallurgical route due to its lower greenhouse gas emissions and financial viability.
events.description: The recycling of lithium-ion batteries involves multiple routes, primarily focusing on pyrometallurgical and hydrometallurgical processes. The paper emphasizes the hydrometallurgical route due to its lower greenhouse gas emissions and financial viability.

events.name: LIB pretreatment
events.wd_description: Pretreatment of LIBs is the first step in the recycling process, involving physical methods to separate battery components and produce intermediate products like Black Mass.
events.description: Pretreatment of LIBs is the first step in the recycling process, involving physical methods to separate battery components and produce intermediate products like Black Mass.

events.name: Physical separation
events.wd_description: Physical methods are used to separate the components of a lithium-ion battery during pretreatment.
events.description: Physical methods are used to separate the components of a lithium-ion battery during pretreatment.

events.name: Black Mass production
events.wd_description: The pretreatment process produces intermediate products like Black Mass, which are essential for further hydrometallurgical processing.
events.description: The pretreatment process produces intermediate products like Black Mass, which are essential for further hydrometallurgical processing.

events.name: Hydrometallurgy process
events.wd_description: The hydrometallurgical process converts recovered Black Mass into battery-grade products that can be recycled back into the battery manufacturing value chain.
events.description: The hydrometallurgical process converts recovered Black Mass into battery-grade products that can be recycled back into the battery manufacturing value chain.

events.name: Black Mass treatment
events.wd_description: Black Mass is treated using hydrometallurgical methods to recover lithium, nickel, and cobalt.
events.description: Black Mass is treated using hydrometallurgical methods to recover lithium, nickel, and cobalt.

events.name: Direct physical regeneration
events.wd_description: Direct physical regeneration of Black Mass is an emerging method still in its infancy.
events.description: Direct physical regeneration of Black Mass is an emerging method still in its infancy.

events.name: Pyrometallurgy
events.wd_description: Pyrometallurgical recycling is energy-intensive, generating GHG and toxic fumes, and is less financially viable due to lithium loss in slag.
events.description: Pyrometallurgical recycling is energy-intensive, generating GHG and toxic fumes, and is less financially viable due to lithium loss in slag.

events.name: Hydrometallurgy
events.wd_description: Hydrometallurgical recycling generates fewer GHG emissions and produces usable products within the battery value chain.
events.description: Hydrometallurgical recycling generates fewer GHG emissions and produces usable products within the battery value chain.

events.name: Solvent extraction
events.wd_description: Solvent extraction is used to produce battery-grade nickel, cobalt, and manganese sulfates from Black Mass.
events.description: Solvent extraction is used to produce battery-grade nickel, cobalt, and manganese sulfates from Black Mass.

events.name: Mixer-settlers
events.wd_description: Metals are extracted using an organic solvent in a series of mixer-settlers and subsequently stripped from the solvent.
events.description: Metals are extracted using an organic solvent in a series of mixer-settlers and subsequently stripped from the solvent.

events.name: Evaporation and crystallization
events.wd_description: Extracted metal solutions are concentrated and crystallized to produce battery-grade sulfates.
events.description: Extracted metal solutions are concentrated and crystallized to produce battery-grade sulfates.

events.name: Crystallization
events.wd_description: Crystallization processes are used to remove impurities and produce battery-grade lithium carbonate or lithium hydroxide monohydrate.
events.description: Crystallization processes are used to remove impurities and produce battery-grade lithium carbonate or lithium hydroxide monohydrate.

events.name: Sodium sulfate crystallization
events.wd_description: Sodium sulfate crystallization is necessary to remove sodium from lithium solutions to meet product specifications.
events.description: Sodium sulfate crystallization is necessary to remove sodium from lithium solutions to meet product specifications.

events.name: Lithium precipitation
events.wd_description: Lithium is precipitated to produce battery-grade lithium carbonate or lithium hydroxide monohydrate.
events.description: Lithium is precipitated to produce battery-grade lithium carbonate or lithium hydroxide monohydrate.

events.name: Project implementation paths
events.wd_description: Implementing hydrometallurgical processes at a commercial scale requires combining and integrating various subprocesses. While individual steps are commercially proven, integrated plants are still in pilot phases.
events.description: Implementing hydrometallurgical processes at a commercial scale requires combining and integrating various subprocesses. While individual steps are commercially proven, integrated plants are still in pilot phases.

events.name: Pilot plants
events.wd_description: Several companies have implemented pilot plants for integrated hydrometallurgical recycling processes.
events.description: Several companies have implemented pilot plants for integrated hydrometallurgical recycling processes.

events.name: Commercial plant start-ups
events.wd_description: Commercial plant start-ups for integrated hydrometallurgical processes are anticipated in the near future.
events.description: Commercial plant start-ups for integrated hydrometallurgical processes are anticipated in the near future.

events.name: Sustainability and viability of hydrometallurgy
events.wd_description: Hydrometallurgical recycling processes for lithium-ion batteries are promising due to lower greenhouse gas emissions and financial viability. Implementing these processes requires rigorous technical studies and proper design for commercial production.
events.description: Hydrometallurgical recycling processes for lithium-ion batteries are promising due to lower greenhouse gas emissions and financial viability. Implementing these processes requires rigorous technical studies and proper design for commercial production.

events.name: GHG emission reduction
events.wd_description: Hydrometallurgical processes generate far fewer greenhouse gas emissions compared to pyrometallurgical methods.
events.description: Hydrometallurgical processes generate far fewer greenhouse gas emissions compared to pyrometallurgical methods.

events.name: Financial viability
events.wd_description: Hydrometallurgical recycling is more financially viable, especially in the USA, due to lower operational and capital expenses.
events.description: Hydrometallurgical recycling is more financially viable, especially in the USA, due to lower operational and capital expenses.

events.name: Technical studies
events.wd_description: Rigorous technical studies are required to ensure hydrometallurgical processes are appropriately designed for commercial production.
events.description: Rigorous technical studies are required to ensure hydrometallurgical processes are appropriately designed for commercial production.

events.name: Pyrometallurgical and hydrometallurgical recycling routes
events.description: Lithium-ion battery recycling includes pyrometallurgical and hydrometallurgical routes, with a focus on hydrometallurgy due to its lower GHG emissions and financial viability.

events.name: LIB Pretreatment for Black Mass production
events.description: Pretreatment of LIBs involves physical separation to produce intermediate products like Black Mass, which is necessary for safe recovery of cathode materials.

events.name: Black Mass treatment methods
events.description: Black Mass can be treated using direct physical regeneration, pyrometallurgy, or hydrometallurgy, with hydrometallurgy being the preferred method due to lower GHG emissions.

events.name: Hydrometallurgy process for battery grade product recovery
events.description: The hydrometallurgy process involves solvent extraction and crystallization to recover battery-grade lithium, nickel, cobalt, and manganese.

events.name: Solvent extraction and crystallization details
events.ta1explanation: Solvent extraction uses organic solvents in mixer-settlers to extract metals, followed by crystallization to produce battery-grade metal sulfate hydrates.
events.description: Solvent extraction uses organic solvents in mixer-settlers to extract metals, followed by crystallization to produce battery-grade metal sulfate hydrates.

events.name: Implementation of hydrometallurgy at commercial scale
events.description: Although individual steps of the hydrometallurgy process have been implemented commercially, an integrated commercial-scale process has not yet been demonstrated in North America and Europe, with only pilot plants currently in operation.

events.name: Future challenges for hydrometallurgy
events.description: Implementation of the hydrometallurgy process requires rigorous technical studies to ensure appropriate design for commercial production.
